summary: 2010 DODGE GRAND CARAVAN 108000 MILES.  AT TIME OF THIS COMPLAINT, WE HAVE OWNED VEHICLE FOR ONLY TWO MONTHS.    FOR NO APPARENT REASON AND NO WARNING; ENGINE WILL STALL.  THIS HAS HAPPENED BOTH AT A STOP SIGN AND ROUNDING A CURVE AT 30 MPH.  NO ENGINE - NO POWER STEERING.    HOPING THIS DOESN'T HAPPEN ON THE HIGHWAY.    ENGINE ALSO HAS A 'SURGE' TO IT AT AROUND 40 MPH; NOT SURE IF THE TWO ARE RELATED.
